data.title: Peta Murgatroyd, Maksim Chmerkovskiy Pregnant, Expecting Baby
data.meta_description: Peta Murgatroyd is pregnant. Get details on the dance pros expanding family with The Traitors' Maksim Chmerkovskiy.
data.text:
The Traitors' Maksim Chmerkovskiy has a very adorable reason to celebrate these days. Maks and his wife, Peta Murgatroyd, have revealed that they are expecting baby No. 3.

Peta Murgatroyd pregnant with baby No. 3

Peta shared the news that she is pregnant again on Instagram on Monday, Feb. 5, writing, "Yes we know…we just had a baby… haha! This was very unexpected at (4 months postpartum with Rio) but we are sooooo happy and so ready to be a family of 5 soon!"

She added, "Surprising [Maks] on this FaceTime with my two friends secretly filming from different angles made it all the more hilarious. It took one hour for me to get the courage to call him and when he wasn’t catching on we all couldn’t stop laughing in the kitchen... After everything we’ve been through with miscarriages and IVF we’re beyond blessed and know we are uber lucky for this miracle to happen to us. We’re just so happy that we can finally tell you guys the good news."

Here's What You May Have Missed on Bravo:

"Y'all Came to Our House to Play": Tamra, Larsa, Shereé & Phaedra Talk The Traitors Fashion & Competition

Surprise! Kate Chastain Is Returning to The Traitors for Season 2

Shahs of Sunset's MJ Admits to Holding Out on Reza About Joining The Traitors

To celebrate the exciting news, Maks reposted his wife's pregnancy announcement. But, he's always been excited for fatherhood. Back in 2017, The Daily Dish spoke to Maks as he and Peta were expecting their first child at the time and he gushed about how excited he was to become a dad, sharing, " I can't wait for all of this, diapers, and all of this stuff."

Peta Murgatroyd's kids with Maksim Chmerkovskiy

The dance pros are already parents to Shai, 7, as well as Rio, who was born in 2023.

The family has recently celebrated another one of their loved ones when Maks and Peta posted a sweet birthday tribute to their family dog. "Our boy is one years old!!!" he shared last month. "We can’t believe how fast this year went but we’re so grateful that you chose us to be your family! Thank you for leaving your little footprints on our souls! We love you very much. Happy birthday little Hachi!"

Maksim Chmerkovskiy on Peacock's The Traitors Season 2

While we wait for more sweet updates on Maks and his family, make sure you tune into Season 2 of Peacock's The Traitors. He's appearing on Season 2 of the Peacock series alongside several Bravolebs, including Larsa Pippen (The Real Housewives of Miami), Phaedra Parks (The Real Housewives of Atlanta, Married to Medicine), Shereé Whitfield (The Real Housewives of Atlanta), and Tamra Judge (The Real Housewives of Orange County).

Check out what host Alan Cumming has shared about the show by checking out the clip at the top of the post.
